sent.orig: The coal dry distillation product is the coal, the coal-tar oil and the coal gas.
sent.trans: 煤干馏的产物是煤炭、煤焦油和煤气。

sent.orig: Coal mining enterprises and coal trading enterprises may not adulterate coal andcoalquality coal.
sent.trans: 煤矿企业和煤炭经营企业不得在煤炭中掺杂、掺假，以次充好。

sent.orig: Coal gasifier, coal gas generator, coal gasification plant, coal gasification furnace.
sent.trans: 煤气化炉，煤气发生器，煤炭地下气化厂，煤气炉。

sent.orig: Main product has cleaned coal, wash mixed coal, choose mixed coal.
sent.trans: 主要产品有洗精煤、洗混煤、筛选混煤。

sent.orig: Through researching on coal-bearing stratum in Shuanghua coal field, the usual coal formation rules are reviewed.
sent.trans: 通过对双桦煤田含煤地层的研究，总结出了双桦煤田的一般成煤规律。
